title: Update Muscle Mass value text color to match Body Fat % styling

requirements.summary: Update the Muscle Mass estimation value text color in the Body Analysis results display to match the styling used for the Body Fat % and Confidence values, ensuring consistent and readable text color across all result metrics
acceptanceCriteria: The Muscle Mass value text color matches the text color used for Body Fat % value
The Muscle Mass value text color matches the text color used for Confidence value
The Muscle Mass value text is clearly readable against its background
All three result values (Body Fat %, Confidence, Muscle Mass) have consistent text styling

file_operations.description: Update the text color styling for the Muscle Mass estimation value to match the text color classes used for Body Fat % and Confidence values. Locate the section that displays the Muscle Mass result (muscleMassEstimate) and modify only the text color CSS class or inline style on the value element to ensure consistency with the other two metrics. Do not change the label styling, layout, positioning, or background colors. Ensure the updated color provides clear readability against the background.
